content.description: A modern take on the classic card game, FARO
content.intro: FARO is an interesting game because there isn't much to it, so how do you spice it up? Also my first Godot release
content.body: An adventure into 'Juice' and creativity this project has been a wonderful challenge into adding excitement where there might not have been before
content.conclusion: My current highscore is 7496, lemme know if you beat it!

content.description: Bite-Sized yet in-depth Lacrosse simulation/auto-battler and management game
content.intro: My biggest game dev project to date featuring a full release on Steam
content.body: Inspired by popular auto battlers and sports sims (like OOTP), I decided to try my hand at a realistic stats-based lacrosse simulator
content.conclusion: A ton of tests, spreadsheets, and hours led to the most recent version which I believe accurately reflects modern field lacrosse. If you'd like more behind-the-scenes into this project, I'd be happy to talk!
content.imageAltText: Gameplay screenshot of Mini Lax Sim 24

content.description: Fast paced trick taking card game featuring AI (decision tree) opponents
content.intro: Everyone should make a card game as the lessons learned in logic are priceless
content.body: Although I had experimented with simple 'AI' before, this was my most elaborated on AI opponent, and it puts up quite a fight!
content.conclusion: For a more behind-the-scenes look contact me and I'd be happy to share everything!
